comment:
* The class containing the enabled setting of a package component. *

* This is used by the {@link #setComponentEnabledSettings(List)} to support the batch updates * of the enabled settings of components. * * @see #setComponentEnabledSettings(List)

variables.name: mPackageName
variables.comment: * The package name of the application to enable the setting.

variables.name: mComponentName
variables.comment: * The component name of the application to enable the setting.

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the package name of the setting.
         *
         * @return the package name.
         * @hide

methods.name: public String getClassName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the component class name of the setting.
         *
         * @return the class name.
         * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isComponent()
methods.comment:
* Whether or not this is for the component level's enabled setting update.
         *
         * @return {@code true} if it's the component level enabled setting update.
         * @hide

methods.name: public ComponentName getComponentName()
methods.comment: * The component name of the application to enable the setting.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
